title: Garyx
text: Garyx, the Firelord, the Cleanser of Worlds, is the [[Dragon God|Dragon Gods]] of Fire, Destruction, and Renewal. When the [[Light of Siberys]] rained destruction on [[Xen'drik]] at the end of the [[Age of Giants]], they shouted prayers to Garyx, beseeching Him for the power to reforge the future.
